name: Pixel Crypt
description:
Super low-res dungeon crawler with a choice of characters and endings. Defeat monsters, collect loot, seek out hidden areas and try not to die. Don't forget to visit the shop!

Keep an eye on your status - health, food and cooldown bars at the top of the screen.

Gamepad compatible.

Keyboard Controls
move - ARROW KEYS
shoot - X
back - ESC

Made for LOWREZJAM 2021

Follow me on Twitter
